mapper.select:
SELECT supplier_id as supplierId, supplier_coding as supplierCoding, supplier_name as supplierName, supplier_type as supplierType, supplier_linkman as supplierLinkman, supplier_phone as supplierPhone, supplier_contract as supplierContract, supplier_shop as supplierShop, supplier_use as supplierUse, supplier_abbreviation as supplierAbbreviation
FROM smscke_supplier WHERE 1=1
AND SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{supplierName}||'%'
ORDER BY supplier_coding ASC

SELECT SUPPLIER_ID AS supplierId, SUPPLIER_TYPE AS supplierType, SUPPLIER_NAME AS supplierName, SUPPLIER_CLASSIFY AS supplierClassify ,SUPPLIER_SHORTENED AS supplierShortened,SUPPLIER_CORPORATION AS supplierCorporation,SUPPLIER_LEGAL_PERSON_PHONE AS supplierLegalPersonPhone,SUPPLIER_SITE AS supplierSite,SUPPLIER_TRUSTED_CODE AS supplierTrustedCode,SUPPLIER_LINKMAN AS supplierLinkman,SUPPLIER_PHONE AS supplierPhone,SUPPLIER_EMAIL AS supplierEmail,SUPPLIER_SHOP AS supplierShop,SUPPLIER_CONTRACT AS supplierContract,SUPPLIER_STATE AS supplierState FROM smscke_supplier WHERE SUPPLIER_ID=#{0}
mapper.update: UPDATE smscke_supplier SET SUPPLIER_TYPE = #{supplierType}, SUPPLIER_NAME = #{supplierName}, SUPPLIER_CLASSIFY = #{supplierClassify}, SUPPLIER_SHORTENED = #{supplierShortened}, SUPPLIER_CORPORATION = #{supplierCorporation}, SUPPLIER_LEGAL_PERSON_PHONE = #{supplierLegalPersonPhone}, SUPPLIER_SITE = #{supplierSite}, SUPPLIER_TRUSTED_CODE = #{supplierTrustedCode}, SUPPLIER_LINKMAN = #{supplierLinkman}, SUPPLIER_PHONE = #{supplierPhone}, SUPPLIER_EMAIL = #{supplierEmail}, SUPPLIER_SHOP = #{supplierShop}, SUPPLIER_CONTRACT = #{supplierContract} WHERE SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId}
